cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 85 miles ESE of Caibarien, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving west, then forecast to turn northwest toward the Florida Keys and the southwest coast of Florida
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Keys then southwest coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.warning_coast: N/A – no warnings in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North coast of Cuba, Central and Northwestern Bahamas, Florida Keys, and much of the Florida peninsula
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-cyclone wind impacts expected at San Juan, PR over the next five days.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for San Juan, PR.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated showers possible; no heavy rainfall directly attributable to Irma expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and dangerous rip currents may continue for another day along north-facing Puerto Rico beaches.
